text: Arthur Bradley Wheat (26 October 1921 – 18 January 1986) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back or as an inside forward in the Football League for Bradford Park Avenue and York City, and in Scotland for Montrose. His father, also called Arthur Wheat played county cricket for Nottinghamshire. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1986 deaths Category:People from Selston Category:Sportspeople from Nottinghamshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards Category:Montrose F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Arthur Wheat (footballer)
